channel.title: Consumer Discretionary on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Consumer Discretionary on FinanClub

item.title: NKE
item.description: score:261 Chances: Nike remains a top consumer discretionary pick, but the need for ’newness and innovation’ is creating market share opportunities for newer entrants into footwear. The Shoes and Retail Apparel industry reflects tough trends on elevated operating and input costs. However, product innovation, robust demand trends and digital growth place it well.
